subtitle: hi this is Simon Jacobsen and welcome to
meaningful Monday's where we answer your
personal questions my husband and I are
no longer intimate I don't think he's
even attracted to me he seems to like
his iPhone more than he likes me should
I consider divorce questions like these
need a lot more information before
advising has this always been this way
from the beginning of the marriage has
there been any issues that have caused
this type of distance is your husband
perhaps having an affair have you tried
therapy does he agree with you that
there's a problem is he ready to work on
it without answering all those questions
it's very difficult to advise especially
when it comes to a dramatic move like
divorce so first thing is to get those
questions answered if you indeed have a
partner who is willing to work on it
with you and do whatever it takes to
become closer and intimate again that
needs to be established because if you
don't have that partner with all your
good intentions the other person other
side is not interested we're not willing
very difficult to maintain a normal
marriage without that type of joint
effort I bless you that you should find
that clarity and hopefully your husband
wants more than you do even to reconcile
and find peace between the two of you
but you have to be ready for surprises
and things you may not even be aware of
this has been meaning for Monday's with
Simon Jacobson if you'd like to submit
to your own question please click on the
link below
everyone have a very meaningful week
you
